fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Competition, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Regional Policy, External Relations, Climate Action, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: As part of a global organisation Elliott seeks to keep abreast of legislation which may affect its operations, or the operations of its affiliates. Legislation currently of interest to Elliott includes, but is not limited to directives, regulations, and legislation which may affect the financial services and energy sectors, as well as Elliott’s other business interests.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
Alternative Investment Managers Association - AIMA 
 
KREAB
goals__remit: Elliott provides, among other things, investment advisory services. Elliott uses a global investment approach in a number areas including securities, commodities trading, fixed-income positions, performing debt, equity oriented positions, real estate, and portfolio protection.
